name: Towers Frontline
description:
Note: The game has no single player functionality, and will require two players on two separate devices to function properly. 

---------------------------------------About----------------------------------------

Tower's frontline is a android game in which two players battle head to head in tower-defense like combat. Each player has a series of "plots" on their side of the field that they can place towers on (either defensive or economy boosting), and their goal is to protect their corresponding base from the enemy while simultaneously trying to take over theirs. Each player has three different unit types to choose from when trying to amass a force to take on their enemies base. Additionally, whenever a tower is taken by the enemy it instantly becomes part of their territory, thus allowing them to build towers on the plot and summon units on the square of the map on which said plot rests.

------------------------------------How To Play-----------------------------------

Everything is done through a series of taps.
